nodes.text: The Cassander subsector was one of three subsectors formed by the Galactic Empire after its annexation of the Cassandran Worlds in the Outer Rim Territories shortly after the Battle of Yavin. The region was re-named the Cassandran Sectors and divided into the Cassander subsector, the Tadrin sector, and the Tendrannan sector. The planet Cassander was made the sector's capital. In addition to the Cassander system, other star systems of the Cassander sector included the Altunna system, Forsen system, Ord Canfre system, and Peldon Minor system.
